index.teaser: CitizenLove connects people that can help with people in need. Post your help request if you need help!

step1.headline: Where do you need help?
step1.location_explained: Your location will not be shared with anyone. We only use it to notify people near you that want to help.
step1.where_do_you_need_help: What do you need help with?

step2.headline: Tell us a bit more...
step2.title: In one sentence: What do you need?
step2.title_explained: Write your sentence in a way so helpers immediately understand what you need
step2.title_placeholder: e.g. Look after my kids Monday
step2.desc_explained: Add the details of your needs here.
step2.desc_error_missing: Please tell us what you need.
step2.desc_placeholder: I need someone to look after my kids during the day because I have to work at the hospital.
step2.email_explained: We will send the contact details of people offering help to this e-mail address. The E-Mail address will not be shared with anyone.
step2.email_error_wrong: Please provide a correct email address.

confirm.title: Great success!
confirm.subtitle: Our helpers will contact you shortly by e-mail!
confirm.text: You will receive an e-mail to {email} with a copy of your request.
